Reviews Service API Documentation

This document provides an overview of the Reviews Service API.

Classes and Methods

SubmitReview Class

The SubmitReview class handles the submission of new product reviews.

UpdateReview Class

The UpdateReview class allows updating an existing review.

DeleteReview Class

The DeleteReview class allows deleting a review.

GetProductReviews Class

The GetProductReviews class retrieves reviews for a specific product.

GetCustomerReviews Class

The GetCustomerReviews class retrieves reviews made by a specific customer.

ModerateReview Class

The ModerateReview class handles the moderation (approval/flagging) of reviews.

GetReviewDetails Class

The GetReviewDetails class fetches detailed information for a specific review.
